title: Self Mystery Gifting Error
body:
So I was about to buy some rp for myself and gift myself a few skins and a few to mates and it turns out the sale is off, after going back over the text, it said the sale was til the 21st but turns out in the paragraph it was the 16th... Disappointing especially considering the skins on sale and the snowdown ones are bad imo. 

Link for evidence:
https://i.gyazo.com/1384f05062c864fd8c2215f1dc98c8a5.png

replies.body:
Hey Dannerz,

I apologize for the misunderstanding in the dates provided regarding the self-Mystery Gifting event. Unfortunately, however, sales cannot be retroactively applied for accounts. If you see any issues or need any clarification for events moving forward, please post on the Boards, and we'll do our best to clarify or follow up with Riot to fix any issues.
I presumed that, maybe just proof read news posts from here on in as mistakes like these don't seem to rare.
